topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Extending the Size of a Volume

body.p: You can extend the size of a volume, as needed.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes link.
In the Volumes screen, for the volume you want to extend, click the arrow icon in the Actions menu and select Extend Volume.
In the Extend Volume dialog box, enter a larger size (in GB) in the New Size field. The new size must be larger than the current size.
